# [Interview #977: Cosmere Q&A - 17th Shard, Entry #40](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=977#40)

#### Kurkistan

What is/was Endowment's gender? Is Endowment the same being as Austre (making him male)?

#### Brandon Sanderson

RAFO
